metadata.title: Is You Is, Or Is You Ain't (My Baby)

songInfo.album: from Let the Good Times Roll: The Music of Louis Jordan (MCA 12042) ,

lyrics.l: I gotta a girl who's always late
I'm gonna walk up to her gate
And see if I can get it straight
Is you is, or is you ain't, my baby
The way you're acting lately makes me doubt
You is still my baby, baby
Seems my flame in your heart's done gone out
A woman is a creature that has always been strange
Just when you're sure of one you find
She's gone and made a change
Is you is, or is you ain't my baby
Or is my baby still my baby true
